item.title: What would be a good formula
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

I’m trying to come up with a formula so the worse the bonuses etc are sort of thing the lower the number gets…

It’s really hard to explain

Say for example if Player X is using ice barrage on Player Y;

Player X is level 90 Magic with 85+ Mage Atk Bonus
Player Y is level 83 Magic with 110+ Mage Def Bonus

The chance of the barrage hitting will be higher than if

Player X is level 90 Magic with 20+ Mage Atk Bonus
Player Y is level 83 Magic with 210+ Mage Def Bonus

But obviously if

Player X is level 99 Magic with 110+ Mage Atk Bonus
Player Y is level 1 Magic with -20 Mage Def Bonus

It’s going to hit practically all the time.

So i want this method to produce a higher number the better the chance of the spell hitting is and a lower number the better the chance of a spell splashing is, ty if you understand;

public int PlayerMageDefence(int PID, int P2ID){
int P2MageDef = P2ID;
client P2M = (client) server.playerHandler.players[P2MageDef];
int Player2MageDef = P2M.playerBonus[8];
int PlayerMageAtt = playerBonus[4];
int ReturnNumber = THIS IS THE FORMULA I NEED TO DO WHAT I JUST ASKED;

return ReturnNumber;
}

Read full topic
